website_summaries.verdict: The LG 49WL95C-W, a business-centered 49-inch monitor, is a multitasker's dream panel, letting you manage and view several full-size windows on your screen at once.
pros: USB-C port can charge devices, including laptops

customer_reviews.title: Great monitor
customer_reviews.text: I use this monitor with my 2018 Macbook Pro. There was an initial problem with the MBP recognising the full 5120x1200 resolution, but a recent update from Apple seems to have addressed that problem and I can now use the full resolution without having to resort to using it as two monitors. I love the fact that I only need a single cable to connect the monitor to my MBP and the monitor also powers the MBP. It makes for a very neat solution and easy docking between working at my desk and working on the move. It's a bit pricey, but I love this monitor.
customer_reviews.author: Martin Randall

customer_reviews.title: Great monitor, few minor software bugs though
customer_reviews.text: Great monitor for editing. Flexible, wide and lovely. Only things, sometimes it says monitor will go on standby due to period of inactivity even whilst am using it. I have to touch a button to stop it sleeping. Also, the auto ambience is not so great with room lights. Other than that, lovely monitor! Dont understand why delivery takes so long though, but overall, I am happy with it so far. It's a little pricey too...
customer_reviews.author: Mr Be Wise

customer_reviews.title: Great monitor. Ideal for academic work as you can ...
customer_reviews.text: Great monitor. Ideal for academic work as you can have multiple programs / documents open next to each other. Also works very well for watching movies due to the 21:9 ratio. Resolution is great - I wouldn't have been happy with a 1080p for an ultrawide. 3440x1440 is a minimum I think.
customer_reviews.author: Richard

customer_reviews.title: A great ultra wide for a Web Designer
customer_reviews.text: I'm a web designer and I was looking for a flat screen as I didn't like the idea of a curve. I researched this product so much and was not sure if to spend a lot more as at £500 it seemed like it must be flawed to be cheaper than others available. I love the screen. Does exactly what I need. I don't do any gaming, I just use Sketch, Visual Studio Code, Final Cut Pro and it's brilliant. I have two MacBook Pros as one is my work machine. My work machine uses USB-C and my machine uses Thunderbolt to get 60hz instead of HDMI. If you're looking for an ultra wide for design/development then this is perfect.
customer_reviews.author: CHRISTOPHER DUTTON

customer_reviews.title: Amazing quality, size, colour and resolution
customer_reviews.text: I'm an animator/designer, I plug my MacBook Pro into this and use it as though it's an iMac (Since my iMac died). The vast amount of desktop space really speeds up my work flow. The two HDMI sockets mean I can also switch over to my PC when necessary too! The resolution isn't quite as slick as a Mac Book Pro, but good enough.
customer_reviews.author: mbm marshall

customer_reviews.title: Love it and recommend it.
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely amazing product would absolutely recommend. The original intent for this monitor was for video editing but I haven't quite gotten around to finishing my setup to allow for this so its primarily been used for a bit of light gaming such as rocket league, mine craft, yu-gi-oh and a couple emulators and all of them have worked perfectly and is very hard to adjust back to a 16:9 monitor.
customer_reviews.author: Jacob

customer_reviews.title: Top of the tops for audio recording daw, photo manipulation and video production.
customer_reviews.text: Magic. If you can afford this monitor you get loads of real estate at very high definition. This allows me to have three programs open on the screen simultaneously with enough window each for the tasks required.
customer_reviews.author: david wells

customer_reviews.title: A lot of screen space!
customer_reviews.text: I'm a video editor and i needed more space on my prime monitor. This one is great! It's one of the best FLAT extra-wide screens in this price range. I'm very happy with it.
customer_reviews.author: Eva Gebezis

customer_reviews.title: Impressed
customer_reviews.text: Very impressed with this, fantastic display. I can see why curved monitors are popular. From moving from two monitors to this, it feels weird not having the left and right sides of the screen not facing you.The audio from the built in speakers is pretty great too, nothing amazing however it includes a bass!
customer_reviews.author: tripplehelix

customer_reviews.title: Excellent screen
customer_reviews.text: Using this as an advertising board in portrait mode, it is behind glass and has been running for nearly a year completely faultless - we would absolutely buy another one
customer_reviews.author: Dan Travers

customer_reviews.title: No going back to 2 monitors.
customer_reviews.text: Slight back light bleed in one corner which annoyed me at first but kinda got used to it now. Other than that it's a good monitor. I've been used to using 2 screens for a while now but one widescreen makes you multitask a lot smarter.
customer_reviews.author: Damian R.

customer_reviews.title: Moved to this from 2 screens side by side -- wouldn't go back.
customer_reviews.text: Love this screen. Don't use the onscreen split controller as much as I'd thought I would because it dictates window-size too much, but its there if required.
customer_reviews.author: old woman

customer_reviews.title: LG class leading 21:9 at this price.
customer_reviews.text: The best monitor I've ever used. Perfect aspect ratio for video editing and motion graphics. Mounted on VESA column it is the bomb!
customer_reviews.author: David W.

customer_reviews.title: Brilliant Ultrawide
customer_reviews.text: Stunning monitor. Easily replaces a two screen setup. Good menu and controls.
customer_reviews.author: Paul

customer_reviews.title: Great screen if multiple screens required
customer_reviews.text: Great screen if multiple screens required, good quality picture, small bezel size and good built in speakers. Only downside, managing the size of window when on splitscreen can be frustrating
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: A couple of months usage
customer_reviews.text: I have been using this monitor for a couple of months now and can't fault it. Couloir is brilliant and images are crisp and sharp. Comes with all the necessary screws to mount to a monitor arm which was also very useful.
customer_reviews.author: Max

customer_reviews.title: Picture quality isnt very good
customer_reviews.text: The brightness even at night simply isnt good enough, most games wont run due to resolution and this monitor doesent care about quality.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for photographers and videographers.
customer_reviews.text: I'm photographer and videographer and I'm very happy with quality of this product.
customer_reviews.author: Robert

customer_reviews.title: Outstanding monitor for serious productivity and casual gaming
customer_reviews.text: Outstanding monitor. Not the best for competitive gaming due to its 60 hz refresh rate but for casual gaming and productivity you simply can't go wrong.
customer_reviews.author: Nick

customer_reviews.title: Simply the best
customer_reviews.text: Brilliant quality product at a very reasonable price. This piece of equipment has become my third arm.
customer_reviews.author: Tornado 1

customer_reviews.title: the 60Hz are obviously not great for gaming but its still playable but for productivity ...
customer_reviews.text: Although I alot of gaming as well as productive work, the 60Hz are obviously not great for gaming but its still playable but for productivity is where a monitor of this size and resolution really shines.
customer_reviews.author: JC

customer_reviews.title: Nice monitor, plenty of space for multitasking.
customer_reviews.text: Nice monitor over all. Can see reviews on YouTube. Arrived with with one pixel having dead blue and red sub pixels on the far middle left of the monitor. I decided to keep it as it isn't noticeable, If you look closely and actually see it it just looks like a speck of dust. Unfortunately I haven't tried gaming on it yet as I have it running off my laptop. Of course 21:9 has some issues because it's aspect ratio is sometimes unsupported, but I think it's well worth it.
customer_reviews.author: Mark

customer_reviews.title: Avoid LG
customer_reviews.text: Worst costumer service I ever experienced by LG, would avoid the brand at all costs
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Makes my job a lot easier
customer_reviews.text: As a professional programmer this screen is great for a huge amount of 'real estate' Highly recommended.
customer_reviews.author: Kris

product_meta.title: LG UltraWide 49WL95C 49 Inch Curved Monitor 32:9 Dual QHD IPS HDR10 and USB Type-C
product_meta.description:
Style Name:49WL95CGo Beyond Multitasking 

The 49WL95C is an Ultra Wide 32:9 Dual QHD (5120x1440) monitor with a doubled 27-inch 16:9 QHD pixel space in one screen. 

With 70% more pixels compared to 32:9 FHD resolution (3840x1080), you can go beyond multitasking with a multi-format multiplex. 

Save Time 
Find references and organize stock images for use with raw images. Image thumbnails can be viewed on a single screen without changing the current window, so you can reduce the time spent in the image planning phase. 

Manage the Whole Timeline By checking the video storyboard, you can inspect source clips for your videos. Without switching windows, you can view thumbnails of the source files and upload the files to the timeline. 

Do Work Simultaneously You can check a five-minute timeline and carry out an arrangement task without scrolling. For music clips used in YouTube videos, tasks can be completed with 1:1 video editing and a mixing tool. 

Expand Your Workspace Stacking two 49WL95C monitors vertically, you can achieve the same screen space and clarity as four 27-inch QHD monitors with fewer cables and smaller bezels. 

Dual Controller Makes It Easier Dual controller helps you control multi devices connected to one screen, with one keyboard or mouse. You can simply drag and drop files over the connected devices. 

Versatile Display Settings On Screen Control software allows you to control various display settings with a single mouse click. Screen Split will help you divide the whole display area with no hassle. 

Easy Control and Connectivity More and more users are using high-end laptops as mobile workstations. Supporting USB Type-C, the 49WL95C can complete your portable workstation with just one cable. 

Rich Bass Sound 49WL95C boasts 2 x 10W built-in stereo speakers.

Home office and school monitor with more screen space for multi-tasking.
feature_bullets: 49" Ultra Wide 32:9 Dual QHD (5120 x 1440) Display
2 x 10W Stereo Speaker with Rich Bass

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.3 out of 5 stars77 ratings4.3 out of 5 stars
